=IF(IF(LEFT(A1,2)=""45"",VLOOKUP(A1,Sheet2!D:P,13,0),IF(LEFT(Sheet1!A1,1)=""P"",VLOOKUP(Sheet1!A1,Sheet2!A:P,16,0),FALSE))=12384,""SMT"",IF(IF(LEFT(A1,2)=""45"",VLOOKUP(A1,Sheet2!D:P,13,0),IF(LEFT(Sheet1!A1,1)=""P"",VLOOKUP(Sheet1!A1,Sheet2!A:P,16,0),FALSE))=8761,""FATP"",IF(IF(LEFT(A1,2)=""45"",VLOOKUP(A1,Sheet2!D:P,13,0),IF(LEFT(Sheet1!A1,1)=""P"",VLOOKUP(Sheet1!A1,Sheet2!A:P,16,0),FALSE))=17211,""HK - SMT"",IF(IF(LEFT(A1,2)=""45"",VLOOKUP(A1,Sheet2!D:P,13,0),IF(LEFT(Sheet1!A1,1)=""P"",VLOOKUP(Sheet1!A1,Sheet2!A:P,16,0),FALSE))=12160,""HK - FATP"",""""))))
